titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to Orange County, California, for intercounty express bus service, and for other purposes.
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to Orange County, California, for intercounty express bus service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make discretionary grants to Orange County, California, for the purchase of 46 buses and related equipment for intercounty express bus service for specified routes.
